name: Impcantation Penciplume
effectText: You can reveal 1 Ritual Monster in your hand; Special Summon both this card from your hand and 1 "Impcantation" monster from your Deck, except "Impcantation Penciplume". If this card is Special Summoned from the Deck: You can target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Impcantation Penciplume" effect per turn, and only once that turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck.
